name: Party Rush
description: you move continuously when move forward at the start of each level unless it starts with parkour. the controls are as normal w,a,s,d and space to jump, F to dash you get one dash per level. There is a few skins you can choose from. Also to quit out of the game  use alt f4 sorry for that. Btw I didn't get to finish it sorry I'm a beginner at programming and well games dev so the goal of it was to reach the end of each level and be at a house party but didnt have time to add it. hope you like anyways its a basic boring game.
